function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased uncertainty and risks associated with dining out due to COVID-19","Impact":"Limiting the extent to which consumers are able and willing to have social dining experiences","Mitigation":"Implementing safety measures such as outdoor dining, contactless payment, and strict hygiene protocols","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, digital menus, and reservation systems","People":"Consumers","Owner":"Restaurant owners and operators"},{"Description":"Exposing consumers to COVID-19 through dining out","Impact":"Increased risk of contracting COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols, providing adequate ventilation, and ensuring social distancing","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV-C disinfection systems, and ventilation control systems","People":"Consumers","Owner":"Restaurant owners and operators"},{"Description":"Limited ability and willingness of consumers to continue social dining experiences","Impact":"Reduced revenue and customer engagement for food service businesses","Mitigation":"Adopting alternative dining models such as food trucks, implementing online ordering and delivery, and focusing on customer communication and engagement","Technologies":"Mobile ordering apps, food truck management software, and customer relationship management (CRM) tools","People":"Food service businesses, consumers","Owner":"Food service business owners"}]}
